overview: Eran Noiman has over eleven years of experience in financial management in the high-tech field. Prior to his position with Zoomix, Eran served for five years as Finance Manager of iPhrase (Israel), a start-up in the software field. Previously, he served as the CFO of Guardian On Board Ltd., an Israeli start-up developing miniaturized UPS products. Prior to that, Eran spent three years with the Israeli office of Ernst & Young. Eran holds a BA in Accounting and Economics from Tel Aviv University.
